bike.description: Monoque High Modulus C-7 carbon with 12K custom weave carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus C-7 carbon  stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
